comments:
Nightly build N20031007

While trying to verify Bug 40026, I did the following and got an exception in 
the .log as well as some strange behaviour.

1- loaded a all org.eclipse.ui.* projects
2- Then I imported all required projects using File > Import > External Plug-
ins and Fragments
3- After the import it appeared that there is a background build happening.  
4- during this build I choose Project > Rebuild All
5- when selecting the rebuild all an error dialog opened with the following 
message: 
"The operation cannot proceed because it is blocked by: Implicit job."

NOTE: this dialog was a progress dialog (not showing any progress obviously
NOTE2: all I could do here was press Cancel.  However there really is nothing 
to cancel as it did not start my build job

6- pressed cancel
7- then do step 5 again
8- same message as in step 5 appears 
9- press cancel
 

NOTE3: now an error dialog is opened with an Internal error.  The following 
was written to the log

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 4 Oct 07, 2003 09:36:25.924
!MESSAGE Exception in org.eclipse.ui.actions.GlobalBuildAction.run: 
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException:

Tod, Passing your way.  Looks like a concurrent job issue more than 
a 'contributions' issue.  Please correct if necessary.
This is to do with the background builder.

I get this behaviour generally.

If I try and do a search during a background build I get the following stack 
trace. The blocked dialog comes up and if I cancel it I get an error.

Here is the trace:
